title: 4 ‘cryptic’ SARS-CoV-2 variants lurk in NYC sewers
content: New SARS-CoV-2 variants detected in wastewater sewers in New York City could help identify where the next variant will come from, researchers say.
description: New SARS-CoV-2 variants detected in wastewater sewers in New York City could help identify where the next variant will come from, researchers say.
